title: SOLD 1910s real photo postcard  depicting scoreboard operators Mellen, Wisconsin...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD 1910s real photo postcard  depicting scoreboard operators Mellen, Wisconsin...
posts.post_content:
For sale is a circa 1910s real photo postcard (RPPC) which depicts several fellows with a scoreboard.  The town is Mellen, Wisconsin.  The postcard presents in superb condition and is not postally used.  The image has been enlarged to show its clarity.

$SOLD postpaid in the continental U.S.

Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiations.
